title: Riot, please ban my league of legends account
body:
Next year is my last year of VCE and i need to stop playing this stupid addictive game so i can get Atar and go to university. please ban my league of legends account for 1 year. i would give away my account but i still want to play after i finish school. If you could do this for me that would be great, if not then god help me lmao. 

GG
